extension.command.insertRuby.title: Insert Ruby
extension.command.insertDots.title: Insert Dots
extension.command.openPreview.title: Open Preview
extension.command.copyAsHTML.title: Copy as HTML
extension.command.copyAsRubyOnly.title: Copy as Ruby Only
extension.capabilities.untrustedWorkspac: Required for loading custom style sheets configured in the workspace.
extension.configuration.title: Japanese Novel
extension.configuration.commands.insertR: Controls whether vertical bars are always inserted with the "Insert Ruby" command.
Controls the kind of vertical bars inserted with the "Insert Ruby" command.
extension.configuration.preview.layout.o: Controls the layout orientation of the preview.
extension.configuration.preview.style.fo: Controls the font family used in the preview. Set to empty to use the default font family.
Controls the font size used in the preview. Set to empty to use the default font size.
Invalid value for the font size. Try '14px' or '100%'.
extension.configuration.preview.style.li: Controls the line height used in the preview. This number is relative to the font size. Set to 0 to use the default line height.
extension.configuration.preview.style.ma: Controls the max width used in the preview. Set to empty to use the default max width.
Invalid value for the max width. Try '20rem' or '100%'.
extension.configuration.preview.style.cu: The custom style CSS to use from the preview. Set to empty to ignore.

A list of URLs or local paths to custom style sheets to use from the preview. Relative paths are interpreted relative to the folder open in the Explorer. If there is no open folder, they are interpreted relative to the location of the Markdown file. All '\' need to be written as '\\'.
Controls whether the default style sheet will be included when custom style is used in the preview.
extension.configuration.notification.dis: Controls the display of the message when the text file is successfully converted to HTML and copied it to the clipboard.
Controls the display of the message when the text file is successfully converted to ruby only and copied it to the clipboard..
Controls the display of the error message when the document language was invalid.
Controls the display of the error message when attempting to apply a edit across lines.
Controls the display of the error message attempting to apply a edit to text containing special characters.
Controls the display of the other error messages when applying edits.
Controls the display of the error message when copying to the clipboard fails.
extension.configuration.markdown.enabled: Enable/disable rendering Japanese Novel in the built-in Markdown preview.
